name: Drift City-Hottest Racing Game
description:
The engines roar, and who can be the masters of the track?

Limit drift over the bend, only the driver most familiar with the track can dominate the race!

City racecourse elites gathered here, use your superb racing skills to surpass them!

Game Features:
* Various racing systems
Up to 16 stylish classic cars to choose from, unlock car A, B, C or S as you wish. View a 3D model of the car in the garage. What are you hesitating for? Play this game to unlock your exclusive racing car!

* More classic challenge maps
Various maps of cities, roads, streets, mountain roads and etc for you to challenge; Sporty music, cool lighting, stunning street view, and the sound of a racing engine give you the best racing experience.

* Multiple bags of rewards for you to come
You can get a daily bonus by logging into the game every day. Besides the gold reward, you can also get the super nitrogen prop reward to help you surpass your opponents .

* Easy to operate
Gravity induction control and button control are two methods; Easy to complete the difficult drift action; Don't hesitate to join the exciting race!

Come on, let's ride on the highway together and enjoy the passion of speed!
It's time to show off your true drift technology!
